title: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #301,965 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #527 in Dimmer Switches       #527 in Dimmer Switches

shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Dimmer Switches
feature_bullets: 3 Way Smart Switch: Replaces traditional 3-way switches commonly found in living rooms, stairways and hallways with the U-tec Smart WiFi switch. Both Single Pole & 3-way Single are available, you can control a single bulb or multiple bulbs with U-tec APP. Max Load：430W lncandescent/250W LED&CFL.

Dimming with Scheduling: Adjust to your desired brightness directly from the switch or via the U-tec app. Set light schedules to turn on/off with desired brightness for night lighting or gentle waking. The dimmable light switch remembers your last setting, ensuring convenience and continuity after power-offs.

WiFi Mesh Technology: Experience unparalleled network stability with our cutting-edge WiFi mesh technology. When you group your switch using the U-Home app, they seamlessly connect to each other, drastically reducing product dropouts and ensuring a consistently reliable connection.
Smart Voice Control: Seamlessly integrates with Alexa, Google Home, and other voice control systems, allowing you to command your devices effortlessly.
Easy Install: Neutral Wire & 2.4GHz Wi-Fi is required, standard wall plate size. FCC&ETL certified. 18 months warranty.

customers_say: Customers find the dimmer switch easy to install and appreciate its dimming feature, with one customer describing it as a game-changer. However, the functionality receives negative feedback, with multiple customers reporting that it doesn't work properly. Additionally, the brightness feature gets mixed reviews, with one customer noting issues with their dimmable LED lights fluttering.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat quality dimmer switch
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Easy installation,  great quality and I love the touch dimming

customer_reviews.review_title: 1.0 out of 5 starsKitchen lights are not responding
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: The review below was my original review. It was bad!But I felt an obligation to stress just how bad these really are. They don't work, and the company takes no responsibility. They simply do no work. Sometimes they go on but not off. Sometimes they go off but not on. Often they just turn off for now reason. They always say "Not responding" even when they do. I wish I could just stand on a building and announce to the world how bad these are. Customer support always says the same thing - try resetting.  I have now had them removed and paid an electrician a second time to install my new Kasa switches, which work wonderfully and I recommend highly.Buyer beware - these are pure unadulterated junk!!!========These are the worst Alexa switches I ever bought. They are difficult to program and then they constantly fail to respond. Slightest outage and you have to start all over.  Update after a few weeks they started blinking on and off all day. I tried to reset them but now they are completely off line. Pure garbage

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsPerfect Smart Switch for a Seamless Smart Home Experience
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I’ve been using the Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch for a few weeks now, and it has completely transformed my living space! The installation was super straightforward, and I love that it doesn’t require a hub. It synced effortlessly with my Alexa and Google Assistant, making voice control a breeze. The WiFi connectivity is rock solid, and the mesh network ensures consistent performance throughout my apartment. The dimmable feature is a game-changer, allowing me to set the perfect ambiance for studying, relaxing, or entertaining friends. The switch is responsive, and the app interface is user-friendly. It’s also reassuring to know that it’s FCC/ETL certified, ensuring safety and quality.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsIt gets the job done.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: A nice switch that gets the job done.  Alexa can turn it on and off and dim it.  Works fine.  Arrived new and on time and boxed in a lovely box.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: 2 of 6 switches are faulty to the point of not being functional. 1 of the 4 switches has a connection issue, making it useless as a smart switch. So, 3 out of the 6 we purchased work as expected. I'll update the review if the quality issues are resolved.

customer_reviews.review_title: 3.0 out of 5 starsDoes not work with Google
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: The item description and box both say that it works with Google, however, when you install the app it says it only works with Alexa. Otherwise, it works as intended.

customer_reviews.review_title: 4.0 out of 5 starsOnce lose Alexa pairing useless
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Connected and able to control with Amazon Alex for about a day and a half. Then lost pairing and unable to register again no matter what I do. Online reviews show MANY who purchase this switch have the same exact issue and there seems to be no fix. Utec contacted me via email and ask me to try to link to Alexa again and I tried the same process that previously failed many times times and it connected immediately, and I am now able to control with Alexa  again now. Thank you utek

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Easy to install works very well, it's dimmer features are cool by the touch of your finger
